name: HyperShell: The 3D casual game
description:
Get a ready for this super addictive 3D, adventures, casual game.

hyper shell is the best control 3D casual game.
It is simple, single player, offline, endless casual game which does not have end!
It also have various levels with different character and different background.
Epic survival run game! Racing adventure that will keep you on your toes till game over.
The game has single player name is hyper shell which is running to collect coins to complete levels with its best animation.
help hyper shell to avoid collision with any 3D obstacle. When hyper shell collide with 3D obstacle then game will be over.
there are five levels so far and one endless level which can be unlock by completing previous levels.
Hyper shell run to collect gold coins to generate High score in this hyper casual game! Explore new obstacle, levels, challenges one after another.
There are about fifteen unique, new 3D obstacles with different colours in this 3D casual game.
So avoid 3D obstacle collision and starts collecting coins in this hyper casual game.
your speed will increasing with each second until reach maximum speed in this best hyper casual game.
hyper shell has very easy to control,  press A or Left Arrow and D  Right Arrow of your device to move left or right.
this hyper casual game has provided facility of turn on or turn off sound in game play menu. It also have switch button so you can change the character.
hyper shell has best graphics and colour explosions. this 3D casual game has provided pause button so you can pause your gameplay.
this is best casual game with many obstacles and best graphics.

GAME MAIN FEATURES

Single player 3D hyper casual game.
Lots of unique 3D obstacles.
Different Levels with different character.
Deadly traps and impossible obstacles.
Crisp bright graphics.
Super smooth touch controls.
Satisfying colour explosions.
And this is just the beginning… More levels and artful traps, obstacles, levels are coming soon!
as this is our first hyper casual game give feedback about game and what are improvements required.
